sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Table, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, TableBody, IconButton, } from "@mui/material"; import EditIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Edit"; import "./index.css"; const InvoiceGrid = ({ formState, handleEdit }) => { return ( No Qty Price Discount % Discounted Price Tax % Tax Price Total Amount Actions {formState.map((invoice, index) => ( {index + 1} {invoice.qty} {invoice.price} {invoice.discountPercent} {invoice.discount} {invoice.taxPercent} {invoice.tax} {invoice.totalPrice} â‚¹ handleEdit(index)}> ))}
); }; export default InvoiceGrid;
